event.title: Linux weeks in Linz, Austria
event.body: "Art meets Open Source" is the slogan of the Linux event at the Kunstuniversit√§t Linz (university of art), offering workshops, hacklabs, presentations and performances in the field of digital art- and culture productions. The FSFE will be present with an info table stand, so feel free to come by for a cup of coffee and a nice chat about Free Software!
